name: R-05E
description:
STORY:

IN „R-05E“ YOU PLAY AS THE LITTLE BLUE ROBOT „IB-10“(INDUSTRY BOT-10). HE LIVES IN A BIG JUNKYARD IN THE MIDDLE OF NOWHERE AND HIS BIGGEST WISH IS TO REPAIR HIS DESTROYED GIRLFRIEND „R-05E“. TO REPAIR HER HE EXPLORES THE JUNKYARD FOR SPARE PARTS WHERE HE RUNS INTO THE OTHER ROBOTS THAT MIGHT HELP HIM TO ACHIEVE HIS GOAL.

FEATURES:

  • EXPLORE A BIG JUNKYARD
  • ENJOY THE STORY
  • CONTROLLER SUPPORT
  • COLLECT QUEST ITEMS
  • CUTSCENES
  • LOW POLY STYLE 

CONTROLS:

WALK W,A,S,D LEFT JOYSTICK LOOK MOUSE RIGHT JOYSTICK RUN LEFT-SHIFT RIGHT SHOULDER  INTERACT E BUTTON WEST OPEN/CLOSE QUEST LOG H D-PAD LEFT PAUSE ESC START

HOW TO PLAY:

WINDOWS:

1. DOWNLOAD THE ZIP

2. UNZIP IT

3. OPEN THE ZIP

4. YOU ARE READY TO PLAY

MAC:

1. DOWNLOAD THE ZIP

2. CLICK SHOW IN FINDER

3. RIGHT-CLICK IT AND CHOOSE OPEN

4. YOU ARE READY TO PLAY
